bento.name: Bento Combo
bento.description: Served with salad, rice & soup. Choose any two items: Chicken Teriyaki, Beef Teriyaki*, Tempura, Ton Katsu (pork), Chicken Katsu, California Roll, Sashimi, Salmon Teriyaki or Shioyaki, Shrimp Katsu, Grilled Mackerel (Saba), Croquette.
bento.notes: *Beef Teriyaki not available at Discovery Bay

entrees.notes: *Beef Teriyaki side not available at Discovery Bay
